function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential bias and limitations in self-reported improvement scale as a quantitative measure for ubpi","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for wider adoption of ubpi in healthcare","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ubpi in limited resource settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of web-based platform for pfa during covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Taskshifting uc-19 skills to pre-clinical medical students","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased levels of anxiety in students due to movement restriction order","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Breaching confidentiality in telepsychiatry consultations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of non-verbal cues in delivering psychological support via phone call","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal qualitative feedback as the sole basis for effectiveness of services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of uc-19 in occupational mental health and pfa.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Online delivery of uc-19 and telepsychiatry.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of uc-19 module contents by non-profit organization for mental health information dissemination.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on infectious disease prevention measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of assessment of psychological impact of contagious disease outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased psychological distress in the general population due to strict movement restrictions and isolation procedures during covid-19 crisis in malaysia.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Healthcare providers, especially those on the frontlines, at increased risk of psychological distress and vicarious trauma due to covid-19 crisis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of large scale quasi-experimental studies on the effectiveness of ubpi in the clinical setting","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in delivering mental health services during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of freedom of movement and face-to-face service provision","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fast spread of covid-19 leading to a global pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective collaborative practice in the malaysian mental health system","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High levels of heterogeneity in meta-analyses results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor study quality in meta-analyses results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Paucity of literature on the mechanisms underlying the relationship between greenspace and health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Associations between greenspace and communicable diseases not considered","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to consider the impact of greenspace on mental health outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited inclusion of mental health and communicable disease outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of subgroup analysis by ses level in relation to greenspace exposure and health outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Missing criteria in quality appraisal of studies, specifically related to greenspace measurement and analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited research on the association between urban greenery and health benefits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of replication of health benefits in an urban environment","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited guidance for national guidelines on urban greenery for health benefits","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about the mechanisms underlying the relationship between greenspace and health may limit the ability to optimize health benefits from natural environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Undervaluation of greenspace as a resource for health may lead to underinvestment and underutilization of natural environments for promoting public health.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of subgroup analysis for ses groups in relation to greenspace and health outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor methodological quality and heterogeneity of outcome measures in previous systematic reviews","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent and mixed findings in relation to the association between greenspace and health outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusivity leading to high heterogeneity across studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stronger associations between greenspace exposure and health outcomes for low socioeconomic status groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neighbourhood greenness decreasing the effect of income deprivation on mortality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to greenspace may lead to health benefits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to conduct meta-analyses for fasting blood glucose, cholesterol, hba1c, asthma, and triglycerides due to lack of high quality studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to conduct sensitivity analysis due to meta-analyses consisting only of studies scoring ≥ 9","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to conduct meta-analysis for certain health outcomes such as cancer, respiratory mortality, and neurological outcomes due to lack of comparable results from multiple studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistically nonsignificant results for certain health outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Substantial heterogeneity in study results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of poor quality studies in the meta-analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Observational and interventional studies assessed using different checklists, which may lead to inconsistent assessment and comparison of results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Meta-analysis based on ’high’ and ’low’ greenspace exposure defined by individual papers’ highest and lowest categories, which may result in inconsistent categorization and interpretation of exposure levels.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate representativeness of study samples, leading to biased conclusions regarding the impact of green space on contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
